alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:21AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Northumberland, east central Richmond, southeastern Westmoreland and northeastern Lancaster Counties through 800 AM EDT... At 721 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Callao, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fair Port, Callao, Kinsale, Coles Point, Lewisetta, Heathsville, Wicomico Church, Farnham, Westmoreland, Lottsburg, Regina, Avalon, Reedville, Edwardsville, Middletons Corner, Dodlyt, Rehoboth Church, Lara, Browns Store and Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
